edu.stanford.cs.pptx.code

Class PPVariable

  • Object
    • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.PPShape
      • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.PPGroup
        • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.code.PPVariable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PPVar

    public class PPVariable
extends PPGroup
    This class represents a variable in a stack frame. This class is the superclass of the parameterized PPVar class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PPVariable()
      Returns a new anonymous variable with the default dimensions.
      PPVariable(String name)
      Returns a new variable object with the default dimensions.
      PPVariable(String name, double width)
      Returns a new variable object with the specified width and the default height.
      PPVariable(String name, double width, double height)
      Returns a new variable object with the specified name and dimensions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addChangeListener(ChangeListener listener)
      Adds a change listener to this variable.
      void clear()
      Erases the value of this variable from the display.
      Point2D getCenter()
      Returns the center of the variable box.
      Font getFont()
      Gets the value font.

      Returns the name of the variable.

      Gets the string value of this variable.

      Returns the height of the variable box.
      double getVarWidth()
      Returns the width of the variable box.
      PPWord getWord()
      Gets the word to which this variable is linked.
      void removeChangeListener(ChangeListener listener)
      Removes a change listener from this variable.
      void setFillColor(Color color)
      Sets the fill color of the variable.
      void setFont(Font font)
      Sets the font for the value of the variable.

      Sets the font for the value.

      Sets the value of the variable.

      Sets the word to which this variable is linked.

        width - The width of the variable in pixels

                  double width,

        name - The name of the variable
        width - The width of the variable in pixels
        height - The height of the variable in pixels

        public void setValue(String value,
                     String options)
        Sets the value of the variable. This version allows the client to change the animation options.
        Parameters:
        value - The string value of the variable
        options - The animation options

      • setFont

        public void setFont(String str)
        Sets the font for the value. In this version of setFont, the font is expressed as a string in the form 
            "family-style-size"
        Parameters:
        str - A string representing the font
